meta.job_title: Travel Nurse RN ICU - Intensive Care Unit

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide intensive care to patients in the ICU, ensuring the delivery of high-quality nursing care and treatment.
Collaborate with healthcare professionals to develop and implement individualized care plans for critically ill patients.
Monitor and assess patient conditions, administer medications, and assist with medical procedures as required.
Maintain accurate and detailed patient records, charts, and reports.
Educate patients and their families about the treatment plan, prognosis, and recovery process.
Adhere to hospital policies, procedures, and regulations to ensure patient safety and compliance with standards of care.
